data.title: About
data.content: EM Button is a simple and responsive SMS-driven emergency tracking beacon for when in a tight situation. Take the time to set up contact details, custom message and disguise passcode, try out the built-in tutorial to learn more about the exciting features and you will be able to activate the emergency beacon by pressing the power button in a specific sequence or through the calculator disguise. Your contacts will receive regular updates on your location through SMS.
